description:
"The Little Mermaid: Wonder Puzzles" is a captivating puzzle game featuring 100 adorable mermaid world puzzles. With three different game modes, you can choose the number of pieces for each puzzle and enjoy all levels unlocked from the start, allowing you to play at your own pace.

-Select from three different game modes.
-Choose the number of pieces for each puzzle.
-A gallery with over 100 seascapes
-Enjoy 100 puzzles featuring adorable sea creatures and characters.

Can you complete all the puzzles and unlock all the backgrounds?
name: The Little Mermaid: Wonder Puzzles
intro: With over 100 images and three game modes, it's perfect for kids and juniors. Have fun solving all the puzzles. Ideal for little explorers!
